Rotation.RotationList: -- Cooldowns --|-- Single/AoE Switch --|-- Lightwell --|-- Pet Assist --|Scatter Trap|Concussive Shot test|Widow Venom|Tranquilizing Shot|Multi-Shot|Explosive Shot|Kill Shot|Hunter's Mark|Serpent Sting|Black Arrow|Arcane Shot|Mend Pet|Raptor Strike|Wing Clip|Cobra Shot|Kill Command
Rotation.RotationNotes:
Survival Single Target.
Ideal single target raid dps using all cooldowns.
Left CTRL for Scatter Shot + Freezing Trap. (Mouseover) Left SHIFT will toggle between Single Target Rotation and AoE Rotation
Right SHIFT for Rapid Fire+ trinkets+CotW

Rotation.RotationNotes:
Survival Single Target.
Ideal single target raid dps using all cooldowns.
Left CTRL for explosive trap via trap launcher. (Mouseover) Left SHIFT will toggle between Single Target Rotation and AoE Rotation
Right SHIFT for Rapid Fire+ trinkets+CotW
